Job Posting:175043 - Position: W26 IT QA Mobile Testing Co-Op 175043 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/04/2025 02:38 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 IT QA Mobile Testing Co-Op 175043 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: IT QA Mobile Testing Co-Op (Winter 2026) Job ID: 2025-21616 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product Job Summary We are seeking a motivated IT QA Mobile Testing Co-op to help us ensure the quality and reliability of our products. You will work with experienced QA engineers and developers on real features for mobile applications and data pipelines. In this role you can expect to learn test design techniques and practical risk-based testing, as well as mobile testing on Android including device set up andlog collection. This is a hands-on role with clear mentorship and plenty of learning opportunities. Key Responsibilities • Design and execute test scenarios for mobile applications and data flows with guidance from the team • Build and maintain a simple manual regression suite that covers core functionality • Reproduce, document, and track issues with clear steps and expected results • Validate analytics and telemetry events against acceptance criteria • Write basic SQL queries to verify transformations and data integrity • Contribute small automation tasks as you ramp up, such as adding to existing Appium or • Selenium checks • Participate in standups, reviews, and planning, sharing test results and risks • Learning opportunities in basics of automation frameworks such as Appium or Selenium • and Data validation for ETL and analytics use cases Effective bug reporting and collaboration with product and engineering • Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Currently pursing post-secondary studies in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field • Comfortable writing clear test steps and reporting results • Familiarity with mobile apps and basic debugging concepts • Basic SQL knowledge or willingness to learn • Familiarity with Jira, Git, Android Studio, Postman, and Basic SQL • Strong attention to detail, curiosity, and communication • Exposure to Appium, Selenium, or a unit test framework such as JUnit or pytest is an asset • Experience with Postman or similar tools for API testing is nice to have Familiarity with analytics validation and exposure to Databricks, Spark, or data pipeline testing is considered an asset • In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/21616/it-qa-mobile-testing-co-op-%28winter-2026%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
